changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.createView: SELECT p.id, a.name AS auth, parent.name AS parent, rel.name AS relationship, child.name AS child, jsonb_pretty(p.properties) AS properties, up.name AS updated_by, w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, p.version FROM edge_property p JOIN existential_network_authorization a ON p.auth = a.id JOIN existential_network n ON p.edge = n.id JOIN existential parent ON n.parent = parent.id JOIN existential rel ON n.relationship = rel.id JOIN existential child ON n.child = child.id JOIN existential up ON p.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON p.workspace = w.id LEFT JOIN workspace_label wa ON wa.workspace = w.id AND wa.reference = p.id
